episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 55 - Sam Adams - Chocolate Bock vs Mikkeller - Draft Bear
episodes.description: Special Guest: Doug and Tracy Hurst from Metropolitan Brewing in Chicago. Doug and Tracy talk to us about their unique approach to brewing and focus in Lagers. We sample their Krankshaft Kolsch, find out more about their rebranded Iron Works Alt, and get their thoughts on Pliny the Younger.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 54 – Southern Tier - Choklat vs Fort Collins - Double Chocolate Stout
episodes.description: Special Guest: Lauren Colmar. All Chocolate episode!Welcome back Lauren and congrats on the new baby. Baby Mastny small and big stouts. Rogue Chocolate Stout. Thoughts on Hopslam. UKG pub crawl. Brewpub shootout.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 53 – Two Brothers - Bare Tree Weiss Wine (2010) vs Victory - Storm King Imperial Stout
episodes.description: Special Guest: David Walker from Firestone Walker Brewing Company. David talks to us about the great beer coming out of their brewery in California and helps explain their Firestone Union process. Damien and Elliott from Owen and Engine make a brief appearance. Thanks to Phil from Smallbar for hosting on this week's episode.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 52 – Victory - V-Twelve vs Schlafly - Imperial Stout
episodes.description: Special Guest: Pete Crowley from the new Haymarket Pub and Brewery in Chicago.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 51 – He'Brew - Jewbelation vs Victory - Moonglow Weizenbock
episodes.description: Live studio audience. Review of BCS Rare. Steve's beer cellar. Review of Tilted Kilt. Quick reviews of Founders Dirty Bastard and Founders Backwards Bastard. Twitter is for 12 year old girls and good beer. Main round featuring two interesting beers.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 50 – Allagash – Dubbel vs Aventinus – Weizen Eisbock
episodes.description: Decade episode and podcast logistics.  Interesting Cigar City opening beer courtesy of Peter Hale. Arata reports on the beer scene in CA.  Steve talks about great beer at a new year’s eve eve party.  A dubbel faces off against an eisbock.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 49 - Tyranena - Bitter Woman in the Rye vs O'Fallon - Smoke
episodes.description: Special Guest: Rodney Kibzey. Sam Adams Longshot Competition. Sam Adams People's Choice beers and results. Haymarket has finally opened. Very old beer. An IPA goes up against a Smoked beer. BeerDownload Episode 49.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 48 - Bells - Expedition Stout vs Half Acre - Big Hugs Imperial Stout
episodes.description: Thank you to everyone that voted for us in the Podcast Awards. We could not have won without each and every one of you! Complete coverage of Half Acre's On Photon party. Tasty IPA on nitro at emmett's. BeerDownload Episode 48.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 47 - Lagunitas - Brown Shugga' vs North Coast - Pranqster
episodes.description: Special guest: Katie. Comically large bottles of Two Brothers Methuselah Bare Tree Wheat Wine. Too cold for good beer? Rural beer stores. O'Fallon Whisky Barrel Smoked Porter. Two interesting beers go head to head. BeerDownload Episode 47.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 46 - Lagunitas - Imperial Stout vs St Bernardus - Pater 6
episodes.description: Some great opening black ales from Cigar City and Stone/21st Amendment/Firestone Walker. Beers by mail from Luekens Liquors. Soon to read: Dethroning the King thanks to beernews.org. Beer Menorah from Shmaltz. Updates from Haymarket and Pipeworks. An Imperial Stout faces off against another Belgian. BeerDownload Episode 46.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 45 - Dogfish Head - Burton Baton vs St Bernardus - Prior 8
episodes.description: Special Guest: Frank Mastny. Bell's Batch 10,000. Half Acre - Big Hugs and their On Photon winter party is coming up soon. Brewmasters on Discovery channel is actually just about Dogfish Head. Band-aid factories on fire? An Imperial IPA goes up against a great Belgian. BeerDownload Episode 45.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 44 - Anchor - Old Foghorn vs Shipyard - Barley Wine
episodes.description: Happy Thanksgiving - Goose Island BCS Rare releases on Black Friday - poor coverage from Fox News Chicago. Dogfish Head Three Floyds Poppaskull at the Beer Bistro and a quick review of Brewmasters on Discovery. Steve's favorite beers lately including Founders Backwoods Bastard, Flossmore Station Barrel Aged Collaborative Evil 2009, and Unita Cockeyed Cooper. Arata professes his love for Poperings Hommel. Two Barley Wines face off in this week's episode. BeerDownload Episode 44.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 43 - Dogfish Head - Punkin Ale vs Boulder Beer Company - Flashback Anniversary Ale
episodes.description: Special guest: Mike Stephen from Outside the Loop Radio. Opening beers Stone Arrogant Bastard vs the oaked version. Rock Bottom and Gordon Biersch merging. Four Loko banned. A pumpkin beer goes up against an india brown ale. BeerDownload Episode 43.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 42 - Stone - Russian Imperial Stout vs Southern Tier - Jah-va
episodes.description: Opening beers courtesy of Webmaster Ben, Dogfish Head Squall 90 Minute IPA and Regular 90 Minute IPA. More beers from FOWBAB. Review of Bangers and Lace. Beermenus.com. More about Firestone Walker. Two stouts go head to head in this week's round. BeerDownload Episode 42.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 41 - Ska - Euphoria Pale Ale vs Ale Asylum - Hopalicious
episodes.description: Special Guest: Alyssa Arata. Unearthly and Oaked Unearthly taste test. FOWBAB results. Firestone Walker. Four Loko in Chicago? Hot Tub Time Machine. Plus the Beer Mile. Two nice IPAs go head to head in this week's episode. BeerDownload Episode 41.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 40 - Boulder - Hazed and Infused vs Lagunitas - Undercover Investigation Shut Down Ale
episodes.description: The real story behind the Undercover Investigation Shutdown Ale. BeerDownload jack-o-laterns. Podcast recap. Imperial Ocktoberfest beers. Cigar City beer. New brewery coming soon - Pipeworks Brewing. A great matchup between a lightly hopped beer and a heavlily malted one. BeerDownload Episode 40.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 39 - Fort Collins - Z Lager vs Weyerbacher - Quad
episodes.description: Special guests: Steve and Katie Kadlec. A variety of belgian beers in the opening round. Destihl update? A smoked beer against a quad. BeerDownload Episode 39.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 38 - Goose Island - Matilda vs Goose Island - Pere Jacques
episodes.description: Special guest: Peter Hale. Recap of Flying Dog and HST. Peter's epic drinking weekend. Terrapin - Reunion '10. Steve runs the IAHE conference hospitality suite. Cigar City - Capricho Oscuro. Two premiere Goose Island belgian beers face off. Download Episode 38.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 37 - Avery - Mephistopheles vs Flying Dog - Double Dog Double Pale Ale
episodes.description: Special guest: Benjamin Bogolub. Have Ben's tastes changed since his last appearance on the show? Opening beers Allagash Black and others. Homebrewing again? Half Acre end of Summer event at Hopleaf. The guys taste two high alcohol beers to see which is better. Download Episode 37.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 36 - Brooklyner-Schneider - Hopfen Weisse vs St. Bernardus - Abt 12
episodes.description: Despite Steve's boycott, Arata still drinks Port Brewing's Hot Rock Lager. Great Divide 16th Anniversary, needs to be aged? Wood aged beers, a complete discussion. Shout outs to all the world wide Facebook group members. Breckenridge Vesper. A Weizen Bock faces off against a Belgian Abbey Ale. Beer Download Episode 36.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 35 - Chimay - Triple (Cinq Cents/White) vs Orval
episodes.description: Special Guest: Phil Regan. Tales of biking across the country, and beer. Lagunitas - A Little Sumpin' Wild Ale. Opening round, Guinness vs Young's Double Chocolate Stout. Phil's a homebrewer?  A Belgian Ale vs and Abbey Tripel. Beer Download Episode 35.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 34 - Allagash - Interlude vs Peak Organic - Espresso Amber Ale
episodes.description: CBS picnic review. Congratulations to Rodney Kibzey in the Sam Adams Long Shot contest at GABF. Thanks to Peter Hale for the Speedway Stout. Thanks to everyone for the iTunes reviews, especially our winner, Styron Pennywell. More of the Pear Gossamer from Half Acre. This week the guys compare a Belgian strong ale with an espresso amber ale and they have one of the strongest debates for the winner to date. Beer Download Episode 34.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 33 - Brouwerij Bavik - Wittekerke vs Lion Brewery - Lion Imperial Premium Malt Pilsner
episodes.description: Special guest Peggy. Recording at the Chicago Beer Society picnic. Recap of the BeerDownload meetup. Lost Abbey vs Moylan saga. Bell's Oarsman. Euro Lagers. iTunes review giveaway - success! Beer Download Episode 33.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 32 - Three Floyd's - Apocalypse Cow vs Lagunitas - Cappuccino Stout
episodes.description: 50 wing/beer challenge. Founders Nemesis 2010. Goose Island Belgian Fest. Drinkers outlive non-drinkers. New BeerDownload.com website. A double IPA vs a Coffee Stout. Beer Download Episode 32.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 31 - Dark Horse - Boffo Brown vs Founders - Porter
episodes.description: Special guest Melissa. Oak Park Microbrew and Food Review review. Update on Haymarket. Founders Nemesis coming soon! Mini pub crawls. A Brown ale vs a Porter. Beer Download Episode 31.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 30 - Port Brewing - Wipe Out IPA vs Stone - IPA
episodes.description: Podcast Recap. Fred running a drunken marathon in Vegas? 14,000 pubs in 26 years in the UK. Goose Island Invastion of Sheffield's. Two great Southern California IPAs. Beer Download Episode 30.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 29 - Green Flash - Le Freak, Cervecería de Baja California - Cucapá Chupacabras
episodes.description: Special guest Denny. Welcome new world-wide listeners. Belgian IPAs. Mexican beers. BeerDownload bike jerseys and biking in the city. Two interesting beers face off. Beer Download Episode 29.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 28 - Great Divide - Espresso Oak Aged Yeti Imperial Stout vs Terrapin - Coffee Oatmeal Imperial Stout (Wake 'n Bake)
episodes.description: Thanks for the beers BeerDownload Superfan Peter Hale. Oregon homebrew in the news. Trunk beers at weddings. Episode 26 post recording oaked beers. The BeerDownload Meetup on September 8th, 2010 at Local Option. Steve and Arata compare two stouts in this week's round. Beer Download Episode 28.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 27 - Brooklyn - Black Chocolate Stout vs Goose Island - Bourbon County Stout
episodes.description: Special Guests Jeremy and Michele Bidwell. Battle of the hoppy "Summer" beers Gossamer vs Hop Sun. Mikkeller yeast series at Local Option. Beer Download Episode 27.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 26 - Brooklyn - Local 1 vs Brooklyn - Local 2
episodes.description: Gossamer and Aruba Beer. Brew Dog Squirrel Beer. New Belgium Belgo IPA at Revolution. Vas Foremost Liquor Store. Mikkeller single hop flight at the Bavarian Lodge. Two Belgian influenced beers from Brooklyn face off. Beer Download Episode 26.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 25 - Dark Horse - Double Crooked Tree IPA vs Orkney - Dragonhead Stout
episodes.description: Special guest Jim Weichel. Budvar and Checkvar, what's the difference? Neanderthaler from Germany. Rock Bottom Popcorn Beer Fest. New Glarus. Bell's batch 8000 at the Bavarian Lodge. The guys put a stout up against a double IPA. Beer Download Episode 25.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 24 - Terrapin - Rye Pale Ale vs Smuttynose - Robust Porter
episodes.description: Steve and Arata talk about the week in beer. 1 beer per day. Goose Island Fleur. Argus Pegasus. Mid-week comparison of Ebel's weiss vs Hefe Weissbier vs Wiesen Ede-weisse. Successful mowing with beer. The guys compare a Pale Ale and a Porter. Beer Download Episode 24.

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 23 - Great Divide - Hoss Rye Lager vs Oskar Blues - Mama's Little Yella Pils
episodes.description: Special guest Pete. Brasserie Dieu Du Ciel! and beer from Nate Baker. Steve's new favorite hangout, the Publican. There is always room for a Belgoo at Sheffields. BBQ and beers at the Bidwell's. Two excellent American Lagers face off. Beer Download Episode 23

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 22 - Terrapin - Hop Karma Brown IPA vs Ballast Point - Big Eye IPA
episodes.description: Time for a garage episode! MustardGate, Flippycup, Beer and Movies. A pale IPA faces off against a not so pale IPA. Beer Download Episode 22

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 21 - Great Divide 15th Anniversary Wood Aged Double IPA vs Weyerbacher Heresy
episodes.description: Special Guest Nora Mastny. Beer from St. Louis. The Schneider-Brooklyner Hopfen Weisse face-off. BeerDownload henna. Two more wood aged beers go head to head. Beer Download Episode 21

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 20 - Two Brothers Heavier Handed IPA vs Harpoon Leviathan Imperial IPA
episodes.description: Thanks again to Chad Melis from Oskar Blues for the Gordon. Beers at Bricks and Local Option. Soured Bell's Two Hearted? Doris the Destroyer at The Barley House. Two great double IPAs. Beer Download Episode 20

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 19 - Smuttynose Imperial Stout vs Oskar Blues Ten Fidy
episodes.description: Special guest Katie. Thanks to Chad Melis at Oskar Blues for the fresh Gordan. Dry Irish Stout challenge Guinness and Murphy's. Nitro and rocket widgets. Two stouts go head to head. Beer Download Episode 19

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 18 - Stoudts Double IPA vs Weyerbacher Insanity
episodes.description: Gordon update. Pete pays up. Goose Island event at Hopleaf. Sausage Fest. Haymarket opening date set. Whisky Point Road. A double IPA vs a Barley Wine. Beer Download Episode 18

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 17 - Founders Old Curmudgeon vs Oskar Blues Gordon
episodes.description: Special guest Alyssa. Alyssa's beer finder app. The Half Acre Chicago Craft Beer Week closing party and complete recap of events from the week. Beer potluck results. Beer Download Episode 17

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 16 - Bison Chocolate Stout vs Weyerbacher Merry Monks'
episodes.description: Chicago Craft Beer Week is May 17th to the 22nd. A chocolate stout faces off against a Belgian Golden Ale. Beer Download Episode 16

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 15 - Bell's Java Stout vs Fort Collins Common Ground
episodes.description: Special guest Emily. No Pants Day special recording. More Macro Lager Playoffs - Miller Lite vs Corona Lite. Two great coffee beers face off. Beer Download Episode 15

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 14 - Yuengling Black and Tan vs Schoenling Little Kings
episodes.description: Leinenkugel's Red, Brasserie Dieu du Ciel, Freeminer, Limestone Brewery, Grumpy Bulldog. Goodbye Charlie Orr. Big brew day. Beer Download Episode 14

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 13 - Goose Island Oatmeal Stout vs Bells Special Double Cream Stout
episodes.description: Special guest Lauren. Dark Lord Day 2010. Beer Mapping Bar Crawl. This week's matchup: A dry stout faces off against a cream stout. Beer Download Episode 13

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 12 - Kona Fire Rock vs Moerlein OTR
episodes.description: New BeerDownload logo. Sweedish Beer. Carlsberg Strike. Ratebeer forum comments. Hot Rock beers. Two pale ales face off. Beer Download Episode 12

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 11 - Founders KBS vs Lost Abbey Angel's Share
episodes.description: Special guest: Brian Olp. Villians Bar and Grill, the World Beer Cup, Short's Brewing. Comparing two strong barrel aged beers. Beer Download Episode 11

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 10 - Southern Tier Cuvee 1 vs Corsendonk Christmas Ale
episodes.description: BeerDownload welcomes Stone Brewing to Chicago. Steve's great Dixie Highway vacation. Comparing another oak aged beer with a Christmas ale. Beer Download Episode 10

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 9 - Allagash Odyssey vs Barley Island Beastie Barrel Porter
episodes.description: Special guest Fred Wu. The beers of New Mexico. Goose Island Nightstalker. More great Founders beer. Comparing two barrel aged beers. Beer Download Episode 9

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 8 - Three Floyds Pride and Joy vs Bell's Two Hearted
episodes.description: Edward 40 hands recap. Buying old/bad beer. Shout outs to thebeerreport.com. Dark Lord tickets. Founder's Kentucky Breakfast Stout. Brewdog beers. This episode's matchup compares two classic hoppy pale ales. Beer Download Episode 8

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 7 - Two Brothers Northwind Imperial Stout vs Dogfish Head Palo Santo Marron
episodes.description: Special guest Ben. Reports from Edward 40 hands. A stout faces off against a special brown ale.  Beer Download Episode 7

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 6 - Speakeasy Double Daddy vs Founders Devil Dancer
episodes.description: The guys talk about the Soup Day pairings, Edward 40 Hands preview, and compare a Double IPA against a Triple IPA. Beer Download Episode 6

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 5 - Bell's Batch 9000 vs Southern Tier Cuvée Series Two
episodes.description: Special guest Alyssa. First invitational beer to the tournament. Listener comments and the Facebook group. Beer Download Episode 5

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 4 - Alaskan Brewing Smoked Porter vs Unita Brewing Sixteenth Anniversary Barley Wine Ale
episodes.description: Steve talks about his Colorado trip, Bells batch 9000, and the guys compare a smoked porter vs a barley wine. Beer Download Episode 4

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 3 - Cold Spring Moonlight Ale vs. Ska Modus Hoperandi
episodes.description: Special guest Lauren. Quick bout Coors vs. Hamm's. Can challenge. Beer Download Episode 3

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 2 - Southern Tier krampus vs. Abita Andygator
episodes.description: Steve and Arata talk about beer and bacon, Argus Breweries, Revolution Brewing, and compare two helles style beers. Beer Download Episode 2

episodes.title: Beer Download Episode 1 - Speakeasy Old Godfather vs. Goose Island Sofie
episodes.description: Steve and Arata talk about the Chicagoland Brewpub Shootout, a new local brewery, and start the tournament with a BarleyWwine vs a Belgian. Beer Download Episode 1

episodes.title: Beer Download episode 0 - Pilot
episodes.description: The pilot episode. The tournament hasn't quite started yet, but here's a sample of things to come. We hope you enjoy it, let us know what you think in the comments. BeerDownload Episode 0
